name: Alexander
aboutpara:
I am a young  and ambitious IT specialist with hands-on experience in mobile and web development.
My background includes building full-stack applications, designing efficient databases, and developing mobile apps that leverage smartphone sensors.
I take pride in writing clean, maintainable code and delivering solutions that align with both user needs and business goals. 
Continuous learning and problem-solving drive me forward in every project I take on.

resume.description: Motivated developer with a strong 2 full years foundation in mobile and web development, specializing in React, Spring Boot, and Kotlin. Experienced in full-stack application design, CI/CD workflows, and UI/UX principles. Eager to contribute to innovative teams and grow professionally in modern development environments. Former professional athlete in sprint canoeing.

experiences.position: Full-Stack Engineer - Tallinn University of Technology
experiences.bullets: Delivered fully functional system ready for deployment and testing, Worked in a team environment using CI/CD methodology, setting up Git configurations and managing protected branches, Developed a full-stack web application for managing graduation thesis topics and teams using React (Next.js) for the frontend and Java Spring Boot with PostgreSQL for the backend, Styled the interface according to TalTech's official style guide and integrated TalTech Uni-ID authentication, Integrated Bootstrap components for enhanced UI design, Gained practical experience in REST API development, database design, user authentication, and responsive UI implementation, Utilized toast notifications and Axios for API integration

experiences.position: IT System Administrator & Developer - GMS Service
experiences.bullets: Developed and deployed a fully functional CRM system, improving customer management and business process efficiency, Supported and enhanced the company's internal IT system built with Java, ensuring stability and reliability, Created automation tools and scripts to simplify employees' daily workflows, Managed databases and optimized queries, significantly improving system performance, Integrated external services (invoicing, customer management) with the Java-based system, Assisted staff with technical issues and provided training on digital tools

Created and customized website layouts directly for clients, strengthening both communication and technical delivery skills, Designed and optimized relational database models to improve performance and reliability, Built full-stack applications from scratch, selecting technologies tailored to specific client requirements, Integrated relational and NoSQL databases to ensure fast and efficient data retrieval, Implemented a clean, maintainable OOP codebase, simplifying future development and team onboarding

education.universityPara: Bachelor â€“ IT System Development and Improvement

projects.name: StrokeSense â€“ Android App for Performance Monitoring in Sprint Canoeing
projects.description: Developed a mobile application that collects and visualizes real-time performance data for sprint canoe athletes using smartphone sensors. The app measures and displays key metrics such as boat speed (GPS), stroke rate (accelerometer), and tilt angle (gyroscope).
features: Session recording even with turned-off screen

projects.name: StrokeMaster â€“ Hybrid App for Technique Training in Sprint Canoeing
projects.description: Designed and built the app for both iOS and Android to help sprint canoe athletes improve paddling technique and warm-up strategies.
features: YouTube API integration for instructional videos
Practice session logging and progress tracking
